[LFC Hosting](https://www.lfchosting.com) has been in the hosting business since 1998. In that time we've served thousands of clients all across the globe and continue to stick to our core beliefs that by providing top shelf customer service we will create and keep successful relationships. In 2011 we decided to leverage our years of experience working with server grade hardware and the Xen virtualization platform and enter into the VPS market. Today we bring to the table a number of offers aimed at maximizing our existing SAS nodes as well as giving you the chance to be one of the first clients on our brand new RAID-10 full SSD node. 
  

What you'll get with every plan
============================

  * Multi-homed with Zayo and Cogent out of Denver, CO 
  * Xen-PV with SolusVM
  * 7 daily, 3 weekly and 1 user defined backup included
  * Free DNS hosting
  * RAID-10 disk arrays
  * Reverse DNS Control
